title: MRI effective for monitoring liver fat in obese patients

title_detail.value: MRI effective for monitoring liver fat in obese patients

summary: MRI provides a safe, noninvasive way to monitor liver fat levels in people who undergo weight loss treatments for obesity, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: MRI provides a safe, noninvasive way to monitor liver fat levels in people who undergo weight loss treatments for obesity, according to a new study.
